评论详情: It's very soft and comfy. I'd wear it every day if I could. The only thing I found odd is that both of the dragons are on the left side along with the symbol on the chest. While in the photos, the dragon is on the right sleeve. Not really a complain, it's just odd 🤷🏼‍♀️ I bought a 3xl so it fits a bit oversized on me.
My 13 year old granddaughter loves this hoodie. Well made of beautiful materials with intricate embroidery details. A winner!
I got this for Christmas and it's more beautiful in person. The inside is not like standard sweatshirt fabric, but more like velvet. Withstands the cold very well.

Sleeve design was on the wrong side which unfortunately was a significant issue for my situation since I was really counting on it being on the left side. I don't even know how the product image was taken but that should give you an idea of the poor quality. The size is 2 sizes down in length & slightly off in width. Overall I'm mostly disappointed & would definitely not recommend. It's not extremely expensive but it's definitely expensive enough for the detail errors to be frowned upon considering how paying almost $60 for something to come incorrectly especially on something like this just feels frustrating. The hood itself ran a little small too although it was unnecessarily pointy which looks rather repulsive to be completely honest. Personally not really happy with the product.
Very Drippy
Bought this for my son's birthday.  It's good quality, thick enough for Arkamsas winter storm and fits as expected.  Worth the money.
Was great just wish the size was more on target
This pullover hoodie is very thick and can also be used for layering. My son loves it. Washed it a few times because he wears it daily did not fade, or shrink. Must buy.
Very soft interior of the hoodie, so much nicer than expected.

As someone who works in a large embroidery department I can professionally say that the embroidery on this is absolutely gorgeous. (Sorry I don’t have pictures at the time of posting this review). The hoodie itself is also very soft and feels high quality. Can’t wait to give it to my boyfriend, highly recommend!

The embroidery of the graphics on the sweatshirt are colorful and well designed. The sweatshirt is very warm and perfect for cold days. Everything considered the price of the item was great. A quality product that I recommend buying.

Ordered the blue one… it was not blue. It was a very pretty shade of green that I loved more than the blue. Green is also one of my daughter’s favorite colors, and the hoodie was for her. So it was a win for us. The details on it … absolutely beautiful, and nice thick material. Got a different pattern for my other daughter and was beautiful as well. Would recommend and would buy again.
Bought for Christmas. Can’t return because return window too small. Ordered and XL and it is more like a medium.
Nice thick hoodies. Very good quality. I bought this as gift and they loved it and everyone else wants one now. I just ordered a second one as a gift for someone else.

No, don’t get me wrong. The hoodie is very nice, but it is not 100% cotton as it says in the description it’s 80% cotton and 20% spandex which requires special washing. The tag inside says it’s exactly that. 80% cotton 20% spandex, like I said don’t get me wrong. It’s a very nice hoodie. It’s very soft to touch. The sizes are true. The embroidery is beautiful, but to be honest, I bought these based off of them being 100% cotton.

I am so happy I went with this brand! It's so well made, the embroidered dragon will never come undone. The inside is lined with very soft silky faux fur. It's honestly the fanciest hoodie I've ever seen lol. I got it for my husband true to size and he looks so good in it.  😍 I also appreciated how the sleeves are not too short. In my opinion it's always good to have slightly longer sleeves than ones that are too short. So they really nailed it with the proportions, materials and attention to detail. Whoever made this really loves to design clothes and you can tell. I will definitley look up the brand and get more stuff from them. I can't speak for everything from this seller, because they have items from multiple different brands, but the brand that made the embroidered hoodies is soo good. Anyways, I recommend this over any hoodie I've seen from big companies in a long long time. I just know this will hold up for a long time. They could easily charge more if they wanted to.

It’s made of heavy materials and will definitely keep you warm. The inside is lined with soft material and the embroidery is very impressive. Even through multiple washes it looks just like new. So many people asked where it was from and surprised it’s not some designer brand!!
Great quality hoodie; heavy.
It’s a really nice sweater it fits super well to. It also really comfortable and soft and it never shrank

The embroidery in the sweatshirt is absolutely incredible.  This product could be hundreds of dollars in a luxury retailer.  This is the third product I bought from this vendor and I have never been disappointed.This sweatshirt far  exceeds my expectations.
Super soft, warm and cozy!

It's as beautiful as the pictures!!! True cotton exterior and the softest VELVET like fabric interior. The sizing is a little oversized and unisex. The designs are stitched on with no loose strings or low quality looking areas, great attention to detail. The stitched areas are not lined on the inside of the hoodie so you would most likely need to wear a longer sleeve shirt underneath if your sensitive to that but it does soften up a bit after washing in machine. It's absolutely beautiful and strangers complimented it all weekend. I already washed it twice in a netted garment bag and dried on low for 15 minutes for wrinkles, then air dried the rest of the way, no damage so far or fading. It's very warm hoodie that I plan to get lost in all winter. I would say it is definitely worth the price and I have worn it many times in even the last 2 weeks.

评论概述: I will keep it but the description is wrong
评论详情: So beautiful, but is not like they say , is not 100% cotton, is 80 % cotton and 20 % artificial material.

I bought this for my husband christmas 2023. I can back to buy him another design this christmas because it has become his favorite sweatshirt. The quality is top tier -quite literally best material i’ve even felt the inside is a soft felt cloth and despite being worn weekly and washed all the time the sweatshirt still feels brand new. i’m not joking this is worth every single penny. The embroidery is wonderful quality.

This hoodie is unbelievably beautiful- the embroidery is exceptional I am not a fan of the material inside and curious to see how it holds up. Regardless buy this ! It’s really well done Sizing - was great in Large which is his normal size … if you want it baggy size up Hood is thick Overall a heavy duty hoodie - not sure how it will wash …may just dry clean ?

The hoodie is very thick and heavy, the embroidery is well made, but have some loose threads so I don't know how long it will last. The inside is very soft, velvet like. I went one size up just in case, it was not necessary, still fit very nicely tho.
I would definitely buy more hoodies from them, very nice and made with quality materials. Well worth the money!

The color of the hoodie is a rich black and it has a very soft inside to keep you warm for winter. I would use it middle or late fall when it’s starting to get cold too. The sizing seems very good,I got an XL for my boyfriend’s Christmas gift and it looks up to par. Overall this is a very detailed and nice hoodie and I recommend getting one. It’s a slightly heavy hoodie which is what I like because it shows its good quality.
Very soft, very comfortable. Great price for material and design.

The fabric is sooooooo awesome....nice and heavy.... The print is stitched on very great quality... The size is very accurate. And I didn't notice any shrinkage when I wash and dry it.. The price for this sweatshirt is well worth it...going to buy more...
Looks Great!!, runs Big so go size Down !!

I got them for me and my boyfriend they’re so comfortable and so soft on the inside feels like silk on my skin, and the embroidery is gorgeous. These make wonderful gifts so worth every penny!

评论概述: Good If You Like HEAVY Duty Hoodies
评论详情: If you like heavy weight fabric , this is the way to go. It is "velvet" like material though. Not that, that is a bad thing. Just if you are expecting something like cotton through and through, this isn't that. It is soft "cotton like" outside and soft velvet-like on the inside. Hard to explain but the shirt feels like polyester mostly.

I love the way this hoodie feels and fits me, i am a heavier dude at 6'2  300lbs  and it fits me just fine, my only issue is when i walk it pulls my shirt underneath up so unless i get a shirt long enough to tuck in it keeps going up which isn't the biggest issue but it gets annoying sometimes.

评论概述: It’s beautiful! Just as expected only BETTER
评论详情: As soon as I put it on and walked outside I was getting compliments. The stitching is so gorgeous and intricate in its detail it’s hard not to look away. It’s soft in the inside and nice fit as well, sturdy to hold up over time. It’s so nice even my teenage son saw it and said he wants one too!!! I told everyone that day where to buy it and what is was called and how great the price was for a hoodie of this caliber! I’ll definitely be grabbing another one as soon as I can. My only recommendation for this style would be that they maybe add a tiny bit of graphic to the back so ppl can see from there just how fabulous this hoodie is from every angle!! Other than that, its embroidery is all over, the sleeves, the hood, the front and all of it is breathtakingly beautiful 🤩. It’s a MUST BUY NOW!!! Ty for ur great product
Loved everything  The embroidery is stunning ! The inside lining is incredibly soft. Best clothing item I have ever purchased on Amazon.  NOT cheaply made. Sweatshirt material is A+++. Thank you !
This sweatshirt is a quality piece  of clothing that should last a long time. It’s worth the cost and looks the part. Would recommend this product.
Exactly as shown.

It’s great, but the thing is the hoodie was dirty when I got it It was not too much but it made a bad greeting with this product

I ordered this for my grandson.  It was beautifully decorated and he put it on immediately.  It fit well and looked great.
Hoodie was extremely comfortable. Didn’t expect it to be such great quality with metal tips on the end of the laces of the hoodie. Highly recommend definitely buying again.

I have one 100% cotton heavyweight hoodie that is amazing and I keep trying to find something similar.  This hoodie, while it states it is 100% cotton on the listing, I cannot confirm that this is true as there’s no label inside except for the sizing tag (pictured above).  The fabric used does feel like good quality, but the inside of the hoodie is this soft shiny fabric (feels nice) that is very reminiscent of some type of polyester.  While it’s not a cheap or light material, it would be nice to know what to expect care-wise and if pilling would become an issue.The quality of the embroidery is very good but there is NOTHING backing the stitching (see photos).  It is very stiff and scratchy.  Of course, you could always add some iron-on backing to prevent that, but just something to be aware of if you don’t intend to only wear long-sleeved shirts under this.Overall, the design is beautiful, fabric is thick, and fitment is accurate.
high quality sweater. Beautiful design. Colors remained bright after washing and softness as well.
I absolutely love this hoodie. It’s my favorite one now & it’s so soft inside. Great quality

I got this for my boyfriend for his birthday and the details on the chest and sleeve are actually embroidered?? and the inside of the hoodie is lined with soft velvet or something? its super nice and i wear it half the time lol. 评论概述: Gorgeous sweater, but tall people beware
评论详情: It’s really a shame, because this is an absolutely gorgeous sweater with amazing quality in the stitching and inside fabric for an Amazon purchase. Unfortunately the distinction between sizes as you go past a large is negligible. I’m 6’5, 220 and fit, and the 3XL just barely sits at my hips and the sleeves are short. It is frustrating to have to go to 3XL and still not be able to feel comfortable, when 99% of other clothes out there are enormous by the time you reach 2XL. Would have been an easy 5 stars if it wasn’t for this issue.
Better than expected
This was a gift for my daughter, she likes over sized hoodies and she loves this one. Very well made, the embroidery is beautiful.
I love this sweatshirt! It was definitely worth the money! The inside is super soft.  I was afraid the embroidery might look cheap, but it looks very expensive!

This was a gift!  It's very nice.  The embroidery work is outstanding!!  Heavy, good quality material.  Great for fall, winter and spring.  Will be too warm for summer.  Will keep you warm.  Has a nice fleece lining on the inside.  Will purchase again, a different design.  Buy it, you won't be disappointed.  The only drawback is the neck opening seems a little small, but not enough to really notice.Wished there would have been care instructions included.  States its machine washable in the listing.  I washed it in woolite on delicate cycle and tumbled dry on low.
This is a great hoodie, well made and very warm. The inside is sooo soft! Would definitely buy this brand again.

评论概述: Good product with well made materials.
评论详情: This is an excellent hoodie, it is well made and so comfortable.

I got the black dragon variant of this hoodie back in 2022, so I've had this now for just over a year now. The embroidery is solid and very real folks. The inside of the hoodie is super soft. I wear this when driving around at freezing temps going 20 mph and I stay relatively warm, but I am also a warm blooded person so take that how you will. The first time I washed it the hood string came out but it's ok I don't use it. It's not sewn in or anything so careful with that, tie it together before washing if you want to keep the string in.

评论概述: Amazing Hoodie, Both the Feel and Design
评论详情: I love everything about the hood I got. It fits about thensize you would expect a hoodie should fit, like a shirt, just a little looser. My very small complaint is that you can easily feel where the embroidery is inside the sleeves, but after a little you just get used to it.
